column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
am i gonna have cancer in the future

It is impossible to predict if you will develop cancer in the future. There are many factors that can contribute to a person's risk of developing cancer, including genetic history, lifestyle habits, and environmental factors. It is best to speak with your doctor about your individual risk and what steps you can take to reduce it.
What is the cause of my back pain?

Back pain can have a variety of causes, including muscle strain, spinal misalignment, disc herniation, arthritis, and infections. It is best to seek a medical evaluation to determine the cause of your back pain and the most effective treatment plan.
